description: I have just recently started working at Tranby College as an AV Technician, I am responsible for running events and installing and maintaining equipment and other various systems.
I have worked as a volunteer since I was 12 years old and once I graduated I was employed as an AV technician to run events and install equipment and maintain the theatre.

Cameo Rascale is an internationally acclaimed acrobatic, comedy juggling act. When they come to my local area I am sometimes hired as a Lighting Designer for them. I have programmed and operated several of their shows including 2 promotional videos.

I have been volunteering on the creative team at Awaken City Church for a while now, I volunteer there as a FOH & Monitor sound engineer, I love what I do! Fun fact this church is where my career started.

In 2019, during school we had to do work placement learning for 1 week, I chose to do mine at P.S.I Audio during this time I learned a lot about what's it's like to work in the production industry. I thoroughly enjoyed my time.

Yes, we all need to start somewhere... McDonald's was my first ever job, I worked there for about 1 year. McDonald's provided me with many skills to prepare me for my future endeavors which I greatly appreciate.
